Week of May 18, 2015 It's a Wrap! Get Your 2015 Cloud Foundry Summit Recap Here. The 2015 Cloud Foundry Summit, fueled by the support of the Cloud Foundry Foundation, has wrapped—and what a difference the power of the ecosystem made. More than 1,500 application developers, IT operations experts, business leaders, service providers and project contributors from companies like AllState, Comcast, CoreLogic, EMC, Garmin, GE, Kroger, and Verizon came together to share their Cloud Foundry experiences.
If you were unable to attend Summit this year or couldn't make it to the 20+ Pivotal customer and team sessions at the show, you can access the video replays and available SlideShare presentations here <http://www.cfsummit.com/>. He then discusses the world of Query Optimization and the new Pivotal Query Optimizer for Greenplum Database.
